General.Name: Prosperity Dielectrics Co Ltd
General.Description: Prosperity Dielectrics Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells ceramic dielectric powders and multilayer ceramic chip capacitors in Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company offers disc type semi-conductive capacitor elements, chip resistors, diodes, inductors, and coils, as well as SBL and magnetic elements. Its products are used in power, communications, and consumer applications; and medical, military, and measurement equipment, as well as the automotive sector. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.220-1, Nanshan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33860
